# Patchwork Cheatsheet

Hanjuan Zhang

This project includes a pdf version cheatsheet for the patchwork package. The patchwork package allows us to combine multiple ggplots into multipaneled figures.

Click the following link to check out the cheatsheet:
https://github.com/zzhj/EDAV-community-contribution/blob/main/patchwork_cheat_sheet.pdf
